about_the_game:
Unlock the “Thornweaver” rider class with its new dragon, and summon the elder forces of Nature on the battlefield!

The Thornweaver Starter Pack also includes an extra dragon for your new rider class as well as legendary weaponry, a themed wallpaper and 14-days XP bonus to reach the skies in no time!

Full content of this pack:
  • Thornweaver Class
  • Epic Dragon (Thornweaver)
  • Legendary Weapon (Thornweaver)
  • Themed Wallpaper
  • 14 Days Bonus XP
detailed_description:
Unlock the “Thornweaver” rider class with its new dragon, and summon the elder forces of Nature on the battlefield!

The Thornweaver Starter Pack also includes an extra dragon for your new rider class as well as legendary weaponry, a themed wallpaper and 14-days XP bonus to reach the skies in no time!

Full content of this pack:
  • Thornweaver Class
  • Epic Dragon (Thornweaver)
  • Legendary Weapon (Thornweaver)
  • Themed Wallpaper
  • 14 Days Bonus XP

name: Century - Thornweaver Starter Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.6Ghz or AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 760 or AMD RX 560
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 2.8Ghz or AMD Ryzen 5 3.2Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 or AMD RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Unlock the “Thornweaver” rider class with its new dragon, and summon the elder forces of Nature on the battlefield!
supported_languages:
English*, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, French, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
